#summary BlinkMCommunicator -- Arduino-based Computer-to-BlinkM interface

= Introduction =

BlinkMCommunicator is a small Arduino sketch that acts essentially like a serial-to-I2C converter to let computer programs speak to BlinkM-family I2C devices.

= Details =

Installation Steps
  # Download BlinkMCommunicator zip file
  # Unzip file and open up file in the Arduino software
  # Upload BlinkMCommunicator sketch to your Arduino
  # Plug BlinkM in and talk to it via BlinkMCommunicator commands
